about_the_game:
Prince Arthur: Monsters of Albion


Step into the shadows of the Dark Ages, where legends are born and kingdoms rise from the chaos. After the withdrawal of the Roman Empire in Britannia, the land becomes riven in upheaval and war. Among the few stories that shine through the dark of this tumultuous era, is the tale of the Once and Future King - Arthur. Wielding the fabled Sword of Emperors, Excalibur. The grandson of the Roman Emperor Constantine III, King Arthur, battled the Saxon invaders and united Britain into a single, glorious realm known as Albion.

Plot of Prince Arthur and the Monsters of Albion


The fate of Albion rests in your hands. As the chosen heir to the Kingdom of Camelot, you must confront your half-sister Morgana, who seeks to usurp the throne of your ailing father. With nobles rallying to her cause, your mission is clear. Prove your worthiness to the people of Camelot and prove yourself deserving of the throne. To do so, you must capture strategic forts held by the forces of Morgana, to take back control of the Kingdom of Camelot.

Embark on an epic journey across diverse landscapes - from wolf-infested forests and mystical druid groves to majestic mountains and bustling towns. Harness the power of your summoning ring to control and command fierce monsters, enhancing your summoner skills along the way. Only by mastering these creatures, can you solidify your claim as the future King and vanquish Morgana’s claim to the throne.

Prepare yourself for a grand adventure, where every battle and exploration brings you closer to destiny. Are you ready to rise as the true ruler of Camelot?

Step into the shadows of the Dark Ages, where legends are born and kingdoms rise from the chaos. After the withdrawal of the Roman Empire in Britannia, the land becomes riven in upheaval and war. pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
